items.sentence: Tom told me that he thought that Mary was displeased.
I stay with Tom whenever his parents are out of town.
We can't do anything about that problem at this time.
You want me to do your dirty work for you, don't you?
Tom doesn't have a good relationship with his family.
Tom wrapped the blanket around his body to keep warm.
I never dreamed that this kind of thing could happen.
Tom said that he was busy, but he wasn't really busy.
Was your trip as much fun as you thought it would be?
You know that I shouldn't do that anymore, don't you?
